feed.title: SiYuan Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for SiYuan: Fix bugs
entry.content:
Overview

This version improves some details.

Changelogs

Below are the detailed changes in this version.

Enhancement

  • Improve database cell appearance
  • Multiple-select list items remain selected after indent or outdent
  • The move doc window retains the keyword of the last search
  • Improve font family and emoji
  • Improve database select field color and layout
  • Improve cursor positioning after pasting images
  • The database primary key field displays the icon of the bound doc
  • Supports find-replace and asset file history on the mobile
  • Improve inline elements parsing
  • Allow stickTab icon in Panels to be used in a browser environment
  • Add block content statistics template function statBlock
  • Improve document tag interaction
  • Improve forward and backward when Open in current tab is enabled
  • Support setting automatic sync interval
  • Improve importing markdown files
  • Add SQL query template function querySQL
  • Search preview area supports inline memo positioning
  • Add Arabic support
  • Improve exporting data
  • Improve serving assets performance
  • Improve data synchronization stability
  • Compatible with image legacy data
  • Improve the behavior of Del of the image

Abolishment

  • Remove Sentry reporting diagnostic data

Bugfix

  • Outline panel update overwrite content issue
  • Paste code block missing line break
  • Editor not automatically refreshed after rolling back document
  • Unable to use Query Syntax to search
  • Cannot enter Chinese characters in database search using Microsoft Pinyin
  • Some security vulnerabilities

Development

  • Push update block ID event

Download

  • B3log
  • GitHub

entry.title: New release for SiYuan: Reduce startup time when sync is enabled
entry.content:
Overview

This version reduces startup time when sync is enabled.

Changelogs

Below are the detailed changes in this version.

Enhancement

  • Database-bound block primary key supports setting static anchor text
  • The text pasted into the database supports the use of \t and \n for segmentation and line breaks
  • Adjust window buttons when the interface is scaled on macOS
  • The mobile database always displays the Calculation row
  • Improve Attribute Panel - Database - Remove block
  • Improve list item multi-select indentation interaction
  • Remove browser default Ctrl+B/I/U
  • Reduce startup time when sync is enabled

Bugfix

  • Emoji not displayed on Linux
  • Database paste causes crash
  • Results not highlighted when searching using query syntax
  • Document cannot be exported as Markdown
  • Incorrect list item styles in exported PDF
  • Cannot export Data on mobile

Refactor

  • Upgrade to AWS SDK for Go v2
  • Upgrade to Electron v32.2.7

Development

  • Add renderAVAttribute method to Protyle
  • Add plugin function getAllModels

Download

  • B3log
  • GitHub

entry.title: New release for SiYuan: Improve details
entry.content:
Overview

This version improves some details.

Changelogs

Below are the detailed changes in this version.

Enhancement

  • The spaced repetition interface on mobile no longer displays key letters
  • Improve PDF page-spread annotation
  • Improve emoji and dynamic icon style
  • Compatible with Sogou input method to intelligently adjust punctuation after numbers
  • Browser Clipping Extension supports multiple languages
  • Add the shortcut key for adaptive width switching and add it to the command panel
  • Improve database entry select
  • Improve search jump focus block and then exit focus positioning
  • Block dragging across workspaces should not be handled
  • Support inserting ￥￥ at the beginning of a paragraph block to convert it into a formula block
  • Reduce exit time when sync is enabled
  • Use ID when block ref anchor text is empty
  • Improve checking for updates on exit
  • Improve PDF search jump issue
  • Display reference counts in the backlink panel
  • Add word count template function runeCount and wordCount
  • Support / Menu search based on current language
  • Support one-click addition of Microsoft Defender exclusions
  • Strip Markdown markers when pasting content into doc title
  • Improve split screen merging super blocks

Bugfix

  • Some database-related issues
  • Upgrade crashes or white screen on HarmonyOS

Development

  • Upgrade to highlight.js v11.11.1

Download

  • B3log
  • GitHub

entry.title: New release for SiYuan: Support local file system sync & backup
entry.content:
Overview

This version improves some details.

Changelogs

Below are the detailed changes in this version.

Enhancement

  • Improve tab dragging
  • Improve creating a new block in super block
  • Template pop-up window supports dragging the preview area size
  • Database primary key anchor text supports line breaks
  • Improve settings UI
  • Disable left and right sliding to pop up the side panel when editing on mobile
  • Support local file system sync & backup
  • Add shortcut keys for canceling super block and switching to horizontal/vertical layout
  • Improve adding memos to inline formulas
  • Improve backward for HarmonyOS
  • Remove Add and Remove buttons for S3/WebDAV cloud sync directory settings
  • Improve search highlighting
  • Support for ignoring the prompt to add Microsoft Defender exclusions
  • Improve relation and rollup style in database
  • Improve search OCR image preview area positioning
  • Improve find-replace for keywords containing spaces
  • The purpose of use pops up when applying for camera permission on Android
  • Improve right click block selection
  • Improve database assets field pop-up window
  • Improve clipping articles of WeChat media platform

Bugfix

  • Shift+Enter does not perform soft line break within a block
  • Query embed block scripts to be correctly escaped when exporting templates
  • Arbitrary file deletion vulnerability
  • Settings - Editor - Font is garbled on macOS
  • Loading certain font files causes kernel panic

Development

  • Add Kernel API for publish binary message broadcast
  • Add Kernel API for subscribe broadcast message by SSE

Download

  • B3log
  • GitHub

entry.title: New release for SiYuan: Improve details
entry.content:
Overview

This version improves some details.

Changelogs

Below are the detailed changes in this version.

Enhancement

  • Improve tab drag highlighting
  • Hide the toolbar when the mouse is pressed on an element other than the toolbar
  • Improve escaping content for database primary key, relation, and rollup fields
  • When all sub-blocks of a super-block are selected, merging into a super-block is not supported
  • Remove Markdown markers when copying inline elements
  • Supports multiple pasting after copying the image file
  • PDF annotations support conversion to text *
  • Improve the inline code element parsing
  • Improve block content stat
  • Improve list super block editing
  • Improve importing conf
  • Improve the underline element parsing
  • Avoid window controls overlay covering SiYuan toolbar buttons
  • Improve list item, super block and blockquote backlink propagation
  • Supports proxy settings on mobile when using network serving
  • Improve drag for doc, outline, database, and block
  • Backlink count at the doc block title including sub-blocks
  • Improve changing database field type
  • Supports click PlantUML diagram hyperlink
  • Improve lazy loading image processing of browser clipping extension
  • Supports setting keep-alive notification text on Android

Refactor

  • Upgrade to Electron v32.2.8

Development

  • Add plugin API openSetting
  • Change parameters of plugin API addFloatLayer

Download

  • B3log
  • GitHub
